title: Service-Learning-Based STEM Career Exploration and Community Contribution Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis skills and foundational understanding of web content creation
context.additional_context: Practical learning environment aimed at reducing regional STEM career education gaps, requiring collaboration between university service-learning centers and high schools

learning_goals: Strengthen data collection competencies by designing a STEM career awareness survey targeting local high school students.
Analyze survey results to derive at least three STEM career barriers for the target demographic.
Develop an interactive webpage providing STEM career information based on analytical findings.
Reflect on the integration of social responsibility and educational practice through service-learning activities in a reflective journal.

resources: Data Analysis Tools (Google Forms, Excel, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
